meanings.definition: To cover or coat a surface with plaster again.
meanings.sent1: I need to replaster the wall to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: The workers will replaster the ceiling to fix the cracks.
meanings.sent3: After the kids' art project, the wall looked like it needed a replastering!
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to replaster the sadness on his face.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays replastered the room with warmth.

meanings.definition: The act of applying a new layer of plaster to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The replaster of the wall made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: He bought materials for the replaster of the old building.
meanings.sent3: The sudden rain turned the sidewalk into a replastering challenge!
meanings.sent4: The replaster of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The artist's delicate touch created a replaster of beauty on the canvas.
